subject: Prices (Fares, Fees and Rates)
Baseball
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The Yankees said the price of tickets for most seats for playoff games at the new Stadium will be less than they were in 2007. Well, yes and no.
snippet: The Yankees said the price of tickets for most seats for playoff games at the new Stadium will be less than they were in 2007. Well, yes and no.
